youtube.title: How Dynein Proteins Drive Flagellar Bending in Gametes
youtube.description: Explore the switch-inhibition mechanism of dynein proteins. This video demonstrates how inner and outer dynein arms walk along microtubules to enable rapid, efficient flagellar bending in gametes. Essential for cell biology students and science enthusiasts!
